ultra_moons.notification.ultra_blood_moo: The "Ultra Blood Moon" rises... Distant sounds of the undead can be heard...
The "Ultra Blood Moon" sets... The undead begin to burn...
ultra_moons.notification.ultra_blue_moon: The "Ultra Blue Moon" rises... You feel very lucky!
The "Ultra Blue Moon" sets... You don't feel very lucky anymore...
ultra_moons.notification.ultra_harvest_m: The "Ultra Harvest Moon" rises... Your crops provide an exceptional harvest.
